name: git-ninja
description: GitNinja is a powerful command-line tool that supercharges your Git workflow, turning you into a Git ninja. It provides a set of simplified commands and automations to make your Git experience more efficient and enjoyable. With GitNinja, you can perform common Git operations with speed and precision, mastering Git like a pro. Say goodbye to complex commands and manual processes â€“ GitNinja streamlines your workflow, making Git easier and more accessible than ever before.
author: Mani Ravirala
